content.rendered:
Directed by Sachin Pathak.

Written by Prateek Payodhi.

Cast  Purab Kohli( Amar ) . Medha Rana( Maya ) . Gopal Datt( Gopi ) . Sapna Pabbi( Ashwini ) . Hiten Patel( Immigrant ) . Eva-Jane Willis( Catherine ) . Sagar Arya( Ranjh ) . Jamie Langlands( Alan ) . Shanice Archer( Carol ) . Akdas Hayat( Immigrant ) . Amritanshu Kumar( Shubhro Biswas ) . Adil Zubair( Rishi ) . Manvir Bawa( Yash ) . Hadas K. Kershaw( Ursula ) . Ruchika Jain( Mrinal ) . Daisy Louve( Daisy ) . Karis Pentecost( Sarah Jones ) . Ravi Multani( Waiter ) . Malcolm Davies( Richard ) . Clara Zoroddu( Victim of the terrorist attack ) . Maria Nekisheva( University Staff ) . Farhan Baqi( Raju unknow) . Nisha Aaliya( Puja Biswas unknow) . Alpesh Malaviya( Immigrant unknow) . Chris Wilson( Police Officer unknow) . Alexander Garcia( Terrorist unknow) . Atul Sharma( Manager / … unknow) . Lee Nicholas Harris( Police sergeant Harris unknow) . Nicholas Benjamin/ep( Newsreader unknow) . Shiraz Khan( Joshiji unknow) . Suki Chott(unknow) . Saulius Cajauskas( Physiologist unknow) . Holly Field( Newsreader unknow) . Megan Rose Buxton( News Reporter unknow) . Moa Wikberg( Newsreader unknow) . Dimple Kumar( Businessman unknow) . Andreina Sambucetti( Police officer unknow) . Warren Palmer( Harry unknow) . Jim Quirke(unknow) . Warren Mclean( Police Officer unknow) . Shahan Chaudhry( Police unknow) . Upinder Yuvraj Singh( Gippy unknow) . George Veck( Businessman (uncredited) unknow)

Language Hindi.

Producers Karishma Bangera. Rakesh Bhagwani. Surabhi Bhatnagar. Aakansha Bisht. Mohit Chhabra. Samir Khurana. Ajay Rai. Vinamrata Rai. Karan Shrivastava.

Production Jar Pictures. The Filmcard Motion Pictures.

 

Number of Seasons 1

Number of Episodes 6

Status OnGoing (2022–)
